body:
Comment 1: 
Well, it's all undefined all way down: 

 670 src/cmd/6g/reg.c:847:24: runtime error: left shift of 1 by 31 places cannot be represented in type 'int'
 184 src/cmd/6l/../ld/pcln.c:93:18: runtime error: left shift of negative value -2
 151 a.y:632:28: runtime error: left shift of 2147483648 by 32 places cannot be represented in type 'vlong' (aka 'long long')
  80 src/cmd/gc/mparith3.c:309:7: runtime error: value inf is outside the range of representable values of type 'long'
  35 a.y:674:42: runtime error: left shift of 1 by 63 places cannot be represented in type 'vlong' (aka 'long long')
   6 a.y:637:28: runtime error: left shift of 2147483648 by 32 places cannot be represented in type 'vlong' (aka 'long long')
   6 src/cmd/cc/scon.c:106:18: runtime error: signed integer overflow: -9223372036854775808 + -1 cannot be represented in type 'long long'
   5 src/cmd/gc/typecheck.c:3326:15: runtime error: member access within null pointer of type 'Type' (aka 'struct Type')
   5 src/cmd/gc/typecheck.c:3326:15: runtime error: load of null pointer of type 'uchar' (aka 'unsigned char')
   4 src/cmd/gc/mparith3.c:255:10: runtime error: shift exponent 52 is too large for 32-bit type 'int'
   4 src/cmd/gc/mparith3.c:254:14: runtime error: shift exponent 52 is too large for 32-bit type 'int'
   3 src/cmd/gc/mparith3.c:70:5: runtime error: left shift of negative value -9223372036854775808
